mapper.select: SELECT A.M_MATCHING_ID AS mMatchingID, A.M_MY_ID AS mMyID, A.M_USER_ID AS mUserID, D.U_NICKNAME AS mMyNickname, C.U_NICKNAME AS mUserNickname, A.M_GAME_TYPE AS mGameType, A.M_MATCHING_SCORE AS mMatchingScore, A.M_MATCHING_DATE AS mMatchingDate, B.GL_RANK AS mUserRank, B.GL_CHAMPION AS mUserChmpion, B.GL_TIME AS mUserTime FROM MATCHING A, GAME_LOL B, USER C, (SELECT U_NICKNAME FROM USER WHERE 1 = 1 AND U_INTG_ID = #{myID}) D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.M_MY_ID = #{myID} AND A.M_USER_ID = B.GL_NICK AND A.M_USER_ID = C.U_INTG_ID AND ${where};
SELECT MAX(M_MATCHING_DATE) FROM MATCHING WHERE 1=1 AND M_MY_ID = #{myID};
SELECT A.M_USER_ID AS mUserID FROM ( SELECT M_USER_ID, COUNT(M_USER_ID) AS COUNT FROM MATCHING WHERE M_MY_ID = #{mMyID} AND M_MATCHING_DATE = NOW() GROUP BY M_USER_ID ) A WHERE A.COUNT >3
